item.title: Wellington Hotel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We are steps from Broadway, Carnegie Hall, Central Park and MoMA, the Museum of Modern Art. Rockefeller Center, Lincoln Center, the Apple Store and shopping on Fifth and Madison Avenues as well as Bloomingdale's, H &amp; M, Saks and many shops and restaurants are within a fifteen minute walk. Buses, subways and taxis are at our door. A short two block walk will take you to additional subways for your visits to other museums, attractions and neighborhoods.

item.title: The Kimberley Hotel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We are steps from Broadway, Carnegie Hall, Central Park and MoMA, the Museum of Modern Art. Rockefeller Center, Lincoln Center, the Apple Store and shopping on Fifth and Madison Avenues as well as Bloomingdale's, H & M, Saks and many shops and restaurants are within a fifteen minute walk.

Buses, subways and taxis are at our door. A short two block walk will take you to additional subways for your visits to other museums, attractions and neighborhoods.

item.title: Park Hyatt Paris-Vendome
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We are steps from Broadway, Carnegie Hall, Central Park and MoMA, the Museum of Modern Art. Rockefeller Center, Lincoln Center, the Apple Store and shopping on Fifth and Madison Avenues as well as Bloomingdale's, H &amp; M, Saks and many shops and restaurants are within a fifteen minute walk. Buses, subways and taxis are at our door. A short two block walk will take you to additional subways for your visits to other museums, attractions and neighborhoods.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: 5 Rue de la Paix 75002 Paris France

item.title: Le Ritz Bar Paris
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
LE RVE DE CSAR

Csar Ritz, crateur du grand luxe, pionnier des salles de bain et de lclairage indirect, inventeur des dners en musique, a ralis son rve : ouvrir son htel idal qui offrirait tous les raffinements qu'un prince pourrait souhaiter dans sa propre demeure .
Au Ritz Paris aujourdhui, lhritage de son fondateur se perptue. A chacun de vos sjours, un personnel attentif et dvou met tout en uvre pour sassurer que vos vux les plus chers soient exaucs.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Le Ritz Paris 15 Place Vendme 75001 Paris 75001 Paris

item.title: Roots Retreat & Camping Resort
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Roots Retreat and Camping Resort is a new Echo Tourism vacation spot located between the cities of Entebbe and Kampala. An ideal location for International Guests and travelers through Entebbe International Airport.
item.excerpt:encoded:
ACTIVITIES include full forest walk with serene bird watching, hill hiking and fishing in roots own fish pond. Mizizi Ensembo Traditional Dance Group performances are also available entertaining guests with traditional Ugandan folk music, comedy and contemporary dance and drama.
We plan by 2016 to be the leader in Echo Tourism, serving both International and local tourists. It takes an exceptional, creative and experienced mind to help us achieve this goal.
